vulnerabilities.title: Donation to reserves inflates debt without health check
vulnerabilities.description: The donateToReserves() function allowed users to inflate their debt liability without a corresponding health factor check. Combined with self-liquidation, this enabled extracting more collateral than deposited.
vulnerabilities.rootCause: donateToReserves() increased liability but didn't verify position remained healthy
exploitFlow: 4. Repay some, repeat to create leveraged position
